item.title: Sentiment Analysis of Movie Reviews Using a Feedforward Neural Network
item.description: Sentiment Analysis of Movie Reviews Using a Feedforward Neural Network Description This project aimed to build a machine learning model capable of predicting the sentiment (positive or negative) of movie reviews.
